DESCRIPTION: Your next #yBlock gaining card gains additional #yBlock.
Exposed creatures take more damage from Attacks this turn.
Staggered creatures deal less damage with Attacks this turn.
Charmed creatures deal less damage with Attacks this turn.
Upon exiting this #yStance, convert your #yBlock into #yTemporary #yHP.
In this #yStance, your Attacks cost #yHP instead of #yEnergy.
Effect triggers if you have no other cards in hand.
Your next card is played #b3 times, then exit this #yStance.
